description: Try our easy to follow Aussie Beef Burger recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Burger,BBQ,Quick & easy dinner,Seafood free,Quick & easy lunch,Tomato,Beef,Summer,Beetroot
name: Aussie Beef Burger Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat a BBQ grill and hotplate. Cook onions on the hotplate, tossing frequently, until well browned. Cook burgers on the grill for 4 minutes each side or until cooked through. Add bacon to the hotplate and cook for 2 minutes or until crisp. Cook pineapple on the grill for 1 minute each side or until golden. Transfer the onions, burgers, bacon and pineapple to a platter and cover with foil to keep warm.
Toast the cut side of hamburger rolls. Top bases of each roll with lettuce, beetroot, tomato, bacon, pineapple, onions and burger.
Add guests choice of tomato or BBQ sauce and rest tops of the rolls against the sides of the burger to serve.
